title: Ampersand Poster
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214094753im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ampersand_4560.jpg)

Celebrating the etymology and form of our favourite glyph.  
Based on Helvetica Neue 75 Bold. We enjoyed making itâ€¦

author: Conor

comments.content: Beautiful job Conor, I just bought a copy (hope it doesn't come folded ; )

It comes in a lovely red tube.

Thanks a million.
Conor... You've got some neck Boyee!
